Femi Robinson (Septemba 27, 1940 - Mee 20, 2015) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, nke a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na The Village Headmaster, ebe e chepụtara aha ya, "Ife Araba, The Village Head Master"
Chief Eddie Ugbomah, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Nigerian Film Corporation, kpọrọ ya "ihe ngosi nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ".
A mụrụ Robinson na Septemba 27, 1940 na Bodo, obodo nta dị na Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun Steeti, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa, n'ime ezinụlọ onye nchụaja Ifá
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na botany na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka (1962-1966) na mbido afọ 1960 tupu ọ banye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'ihe nkiri ebe o mere ngosi dika Odewale na The Gods Are Not To Blame, egwuregwu 1968 nke onye edemede egwuregwu Naijiria Chief Ola Rotimi
Egwuregwu ahụ bụ mgbanwe nke Oedipus Rex nke Gris. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa na The Village Headmaster, ihe nkiri telivishọn na-agba ọsọ na Naịjirịa site na 1968 ruo 1988, nke Olusegun Olusola dere.

N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012, Robinson kpọrọ gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa ka ha machibido akwụkwọ Chinua Achebe bụ Things Fall Apart n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Naịjirị, mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta Achebe na-ese okwu bụ "There Was a Country: A Personal History of Biafra"
Robinson nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi na Mee 20, 2015 n'ụlọ ọgwụ Ayodele na mpaghara Ifako Ijaiye nke Lagos
Ọnwụ Robinson dọtara uche ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria ama ama. Dị ka Vanguard si kwuo, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria, Prince Jide Kosoko, kwuru na maka ya wee si, "Femi Robinson bụ ezigbo ọkachamara
O nyela aka nke ukwuu na uto nke ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ na Naịjirịa.
Onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria, Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, gosipụtara ọmịiko ya nye ezinụlọ Robinson na nkwupụta nke onye ndụmọdụ ya pụrụ iche na mgbasa ozi, Dr
